Package ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.guidence.navigation

Navigation with the help of the Compass or with the GPS

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    INavigation
    Navigation Interface to claculate heading and distances between coordinates
    INMEASentenceParser
    Parser for GPS NMEA Sentences
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutoPilot
    Navigation with the help of GPS coordinates
    CompassNavigation
    We use the informaton from the IMU to determine the current location.
    GPS
    API for GPS data which provides the actual location, direction and speed.
    GPSInputProcessor
    As IInputProcessor it records the data to the GPS data to the parameter store
    GPSPosition
    Processing of GPS Sensor values https://www.ridgesolutions.ie/index.php/2013/11/14/algorithm-to-calculate-speed-from-two-gps-latitude-and-longitude-points-and-time-difference/
    GPSPositionPlan
    GPS Position for Flight Plan with a target speed to destination.
    Navigation2D
    Simplified Math to calculate distances, headings and coordinates.
    Navigation3D
    Math to calculate distances, headings and coordinates using the haversine formula.
    NMEAParser
    Parser for NMEA GPS messages see https://gist.github.com/javisantana/1326141/30d6b5b603fa113d7a17bfcc0a8aaa25a107d581
